name: Tipsy Toddler
description:
Our programmer Dan recently had twins so this is a very realistic sim. Now you can try your hand at parenting! Use the mouse and left click to pick up a toddler and drag them to their bottle. The bottles keep coming endlessly, so see how many you can serve!

Made in a weekend for Ludum Dare 49
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/tipsy-toddlers
